definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: cord, string (cf. II. [[יֶחֶר]]); of tent-cords [[מֵתָרַי]] Je 10:20; [[מֵיתָרַיִח]] Is 54:2; specif. of cords of tabernacle, [[מֵיהָרָיו]] Ex 39:40, Nu 3:26; [[מֵיתְרֵיהֶם]] Ex 35:18, Nu 3:37, Nu 4:26, Nu 4:32 (all P); of bow-strings [[מֵיתָרֶיְ]] Ps 21:13.
